plot: Helped by his female guardian angel Xuxinha, Guto has to face horrible garbage-eating monsters coming from planet XYZ, who want to destroy mankind.
title: Xuxinha e Guto Contra os Monstros do Espaço

original_name: Xuxinha e Guto Contra os Monstros do Espaço
